1015680.name: Trainz 2019 DLC: Brazemore Yard
1015680.description:
The Brazemore Yard has fantastic track work that hugs lush rolling hills as you drive through the picturesque countryside.

There are two main yards joined by a central tunnel or by venturing around the figure 8 loop. Whichever way you decide to travel this route, you are sure to have a great Model Railroadz experience.

Route Creator: eso

Sessions:

  • Freighthauler
  • Railway Festival
  • Shunting Day

Content:

  • ATSF GP60M
  • ATSF SD45
  • SP SD45
  • Rolling Stock = 6 vehicles
  • Over 750 additional scenery assets
1015680.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文
